name: hypocretin receptor 2

reactome.name: Orexin and neuropeptides FF and QRFP bind to their respective receptors

summary: The protein encoded by this gene is a G-protein coupled receptor involved in the regulation of feeding behavior. The encoded protein binds the hypothalamic neuropeptides orexin A and orexin B. A related gene (HCRTR1) encodes a G-protein coupled receptor that selectively binds orexin A. [provided by RefSeq, Jan 2009].
